short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you to focus and get things done!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pomogus is a Pomodoro Technique extension designed exclusively for Chrome, crafted for academic endeavors and study purposes.

With Pomogus, your study sessions are seamlessly structured and optimized for maximum productivity, contains start, reset and add task functions, among with other options for the extension to change the time for a desired time between 1 to 60 minutes.
